sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on Tableau Desktop & Server, dashboard development, analytics, and business requirements translation - core BI engineering functions

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team leadership, or people management responsibilities - focus is on individual technical work and feature development

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job posting - tools mentioned (Tableau, SQL, Oracle, Hive) are platform-agnostic

processing_paradigm.evidence: No mention of streaming, real-time, batch processing, or data pipeline orchestration - focus is on dashboard development and analytics
